Package tiling

Generics definitions useful for tiling.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
TileAble  
 

Class Summary
EligibleTiles  
HyperRectangularSparseTiling An extension of HyperRectangularTiling where only certain dimensions are used.
HyperRectangularTile A tile which is a rectangle/cube in N dimensions
HyperRectangularTiling A 'standard' hyper-rectangular partition of space, covering all the space for p dimensions, with n_1*n_2...
ListOfTiles  
RectangularTile  
RectangularTiling A 'standard' rectangular partition of space, covering all the space for two dimensions, with n*m squares, overlapping the complete space, and shifted by the amount of less than one square
SetOfTilings Gathers all the tilings associated with a problem.
Tile A tile just has to store : The tiling it belongs too Its coefficient (theta)
Tiling A Tiling is a set of Tiles, with a method for finding a Tile associated with a (state,action) couple.

Generics definitions useful for tiling.
